content: HSL4-I Internally threaded heavy-duty wedge anchor Heavy-duty internally threaded wedge anchor for flush fastenings in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti’s ultimate internally threaded wedge anchor to flush-fasten data center racking Easier to design – high loading capacity, low embedment depth and conformity to NEBS zone 4 requirements Highly versatile internally threaded anchor – anchor can be set at two embedment depths (65 and 80 mm) Easier to install correctly – more consistent installation due to a torque-limiting nut and the HSL4-I setting tool Applications Anchoring racks and cabinets in the telecom industry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Internally threaded Base materials: Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2237392 - Anchor HSL4-I M12 65/80 90R - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-I M12x90 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 0.5x HSL4-I Setting tool
